text: Axitofeli yi Abisalomi yabi, a naxa, “Dawuda konyi ɲaxanla16.21 Konyi ɲaxanle sariyan sɛbɛxi Xɔrɔyaan 21.7-11 kui. Konyin nan ne ra, Dawuda naxanye sɔtɔ a ɲaxanla ra. naxanye lu manga banxin kantandeni, ɛ nun ne xa sa kafu. Nayi, Isirayila birin a kolonɲɛ a i bata raɲaxu i baba ma alo se kunxin xirina, i fɔxɔrabirane yi sɛnbɛ so.”
